required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Serum Ages Levels in Patients With Endometriosis
clinical_study.official_title: The Serum Ages Levels in Patients With Endometriosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Serum AGES (Advanced Glycation End Products) levels of endometriosis patients are compared with a group of healthy volunteers of the same age.

detailed_description.textblock: Serum AGES (Advanced Glycation End Products) levels are compared with 45 endometriosis patients and 45 healthy volunteers of the same age. The energy metabolism of the endometriosis group and its possible relationship with the endometriosis stage will be compared since AGES (Advanced Glycation End Products) gives information about the energy metabolism of the people.

primary_outcome.measure: Serum Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) levels in women with endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: Serum Serum Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) levels involved in inflammation and energy metabolism are compared between endometriosis and healthy control group

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the relationship between serum Serum Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) level and endometriosis stage
secondary_outcome.description: By comparing the relation of serum Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) level with the stage of endometriosis, its relation with serum level in patients with advanced and early stage endometriosis will be examined. The possible effect of Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) on disease pathogenesis will be examined.

arm_group.description: It consists of women between the ages of 18-45 who have been diagnosed with endometriosis by surgery or ultrasonography.
It consists of healthy women between the ages of 18-45

intervention.description: Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) releated with energy metabolism, In this study, the possible relationship between the serum levels of Advanced Glycation End Products (AGEs) of endometriosis patients and the disease and its stage is evaluated.

study_pop.textblock: Women aged 18-45 diagnosed with endometriosis (surgery or ultrasound)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosed with endometriosis (Surgery or ultrasound)
- Women without endometriosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women without endometriosis women who are only suspected endometriosis

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
